mentionedBy.name: The Trade Desk
mentionedBy.notes: Primary DSP competitor and walled garden powerhouse, deeply integrated with Google's services including YouTube and Search. Co-dominates the DSP landscape alongside The Trade Desk but operates within Google's ecosystem
